resources.string: Convert your Google Opinion Rewards or Play Credits
To update the email, Go to main screen. Open the navigation menu by clicking on three bars icon. Tap on your name. An option to update email will expand.
How to change my email address?
You can change your payout details before placing the request by clicking \'Edit Details\' after making a purchase
I want to change my payout details?

Keep checking Recent Conversion Status. If its showing pending for more than 20 days then click on Request Payment and enter the Transaction Id and click on submit. We will look into it and update you within 2-3 days
What to do when I don\'t get my amount?
Go to Recent Conversion Status and check the status of your payment
You will get a confirmation mail on the email used to register. \nIf you didn\'t receive check Recent Conversion Status
How to know my request is placed successfully?

1. Go to Main Screen and click on 'Convert' 
2. Select the amount you want to convert and click on 'Pay' 
3. Review your payment method and make sure offer is applied. You can also use a redeem a code in payment methods For Google Pay Offer, select Google Pay UPI as the payment option 
4. Complete the Purchase 
5. Verify your payout details and Submit
How to use the redeem Google Play Credits/Offer?

1. Go to Main Screen and click on 'Convert' 
2. Select the amount you want to convert and click on 'Pay' 
3. Make sure 'Google Play Balance' is selected as your payment method 
4. Complete the Purchase 
5. Verify your payout details and Submit
How to use the app to convert Opinion Rewards?

Google Play Commission Fees: 30% 
Transaction Charges: 10% 

YOU RECEIVE: 60% of the amount

When you make a purchase, you will receive 60% of the amount (see breakdown of charges below) \n\nTo avoid fraudulent purchases, it takes about 15 days to send the payment. Please be patient before giving negative ratings on Play Store
Rewards Converter is an app by which you can redeem your Google Play Balance or Coupons or Credits and you can also convert your Opinion Rewards by making in-app purchases
Note: You will receive ~60% of the amount you pay
Amount will be credited within 7 to 15 days
